short_summary: The National Research Council requires a Technical Architect to support a program of IT modernization and digitalization of the construction sector within the Construction Research Centre.
description: As a complex knowledge-based organization, the National Research Council’s (NRC) requires an experienced Technical Architect to support a program of IT modernization and construction sector digitalization initiatives within the Construction Research Centre.
duration_in_months: It is expected that Contract will begin: [1/05/2024] and end: [30/04/2025]
full_summary:
# **TBIPS I.10 Technical Architect, Level 3 (SPICT I.10. Architect Technique, Niveau 3)**

## **Notice Details**
* Reference Number: cb-760-19831563
* Solicitation Number: 23-58246
* Publication Date: 2024-03-15
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-04-12T14:00:00 (expired)
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-05-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2025-04-30

## **Procurement Details**
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering (Concurrentielle - Appel d'offres sélectif)
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price (Cote combinée la plus élevée pour le mérite technique et le prix)

## **Contracting Entity**
* Name: National Research Council of Canada (NRC)
* Address: 1200 Montreal Road, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1A 0R6

## **Project Background**
The National Research Council (NRC) is seeking a seasoned Technical Architect to support a program of IT modernization and construction sector digitalization initiatives at the Construction Research Centre. This critical role requires an individual with extensive experience in providing technical leadership and expertise in IT architecture.

## **Tender Documents**
* Tender Description ( french only )
* Annex Attachment (PDF)
* Revision 2 - Attachment (French Only)

## **Important Contacts**
* Name: Annette Driscoll
* Email: annette.driscoll@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
* Phone: (506) 377-9104
* Address: 100 rue de la Francophonie, Moncton, Canada, Atlantic
